@Component
public class MailServiceImpl implements MailService {

    private final Logger logger =  LoggerFactory.getLogger(this.getClass());

    @Autowired
    private JavaMailSender mailSender;

    @Value("${spring.mail.username}")
    private String from;

    @Override
    public void sendSimpleMail(String to, String subject, String  content) {
        SimpleMailMessage message = new SimpleMailMessage();
        message.setFrom(from);
        message.setTo(to);//é‚®ä»¶æ¥æ”¶è€…
        message.setSubject(subject);//é‚®ä»¶ä¸»é¢˜
        message.setText(content);//é‚®ä»¶å†…å®¹
        try {
            mailSender.send(message);
            logger.info("å‘é€ç®€å•é‚®ä»¶æˆåŠŸï¼");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            logger.error("å‘é€ç®€å•é‚®ä»¶æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿå¼‚å¸¸ï¼", e);
        }
    }

    @Override
    public void sendHtmlMail(String to, String subject, String  content) {
        MimeMessage message = mailSender.createMimeMessage();
        try {
            //trueè¡¨ç¤ºéœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªmultipart message
            MimeMessageHelper helper = new  MimeMessageHelper(message, true);
            helper.setFrom(from);
            helper.setTo(to);
            helper.setSubject(subject);
            helper.setText(content, true);
            mailSender.send(message);
            logger.info("å‘é€HTMLé‚®ä»¶æˆåŠŸï¼");
        } catch (MessagingException e) {
            logger.error("å‘é€HTMLé‚®ä»¶æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿå¼‚å¸¸ï¼", e);
        }
    }
}

/**
 * æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒ
 */
public class Broker {
    // é˜Ÿåˆ—å­˜å‚¨æ¶ˆæ¯çš„æœ€å¤§æ•°é‡
    private final static int MAX_SIZE = 3;

    // ä¿å­˜æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°æ®çš„å®¹å™¨
    private static ArrayBlockingQueue<String> messageQueue = new ArrayBlockingQueue<String>(MAX_SIZE);

    // ç”Ÿäº§æ¶ˆæ¯
    public static void produce(String msg) {
        if (messageQueue.offer(msg)) {
            System.out.println("æˆåŠŸå‘æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒæŠ•é€’æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + msg + "ï¼Œå½“å‰æš‚å­˜çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°é‡æ˜¯ï¼š" + messageQueue.size());
        } else {
            System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒå†…æš‚å­˜çš„æ¶ˆæ¯è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§è´Ÿè·ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç»§ç»­æ”¾å…¥æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼");
        }
        System.out.println("=======================");
    }

    // æ¶ˆè´¹æ¶ˆæ¯
    public static String consume() {
        String msg = messageQueue.poll();
        if (msg != null) {
            // æ¶ˆè´¹æ¡ä»¶æ»¡è¶³æƒ…å†µï¼Œä»æ¶ˆæ¯å®¹å™¨ä¸­å–å‡ºä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯
            System.out.println("å·²ç»æ¶ˆè´¹æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + msg + "ï¼Œå½“å‰æš‚å­˜çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æ•°é‡æ˜¯ï¼š" + messageQueue.size());
        } else {
            System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒå†…æ²¡æœ‰æ¶ˆæ¯å¯ä¾›æ¶ˆè´¹ï¼");
        }
        System.out.println("=======================");

        return msg;
    }

}

æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒæœåŠ¡ BrokerServer

/**
 * ç”¨äºå¯åŠ¨æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ä¸­å¿ƒ
 */
public class BrokerServer implements Runnable {

    public static int SERVICE_PORT = 9999;

    private final Socket socket;

    public BrokerServer(Socket socket) {
        this.socket = socket;
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        try (
                BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(
                        socket.getInputStream()));
                PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(socket.getOutputStream())
        )
        {
            while (true) {
                String str = in.readLine();
                if (str == null) {
                    continue;
                }
                System.out.println("æ¥æ”¶åˆ°åŸå§‹æ•°æ®ï¼š" + str);

                if (str.equals("CONSUME")) { //CONSUME è¡¨ç¤ºè¦æ¶ˆè´¹ä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯
                    //ä»æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ¶ˆè´¹ä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯
                    String message = Broker.consume();
                    out.println(message);
                    out.flush();
                } else if (str.contains("SEND:")){
                    //æ¥å—åˆ°çš„è¯·æ±‚åŒ…å«SEND:å­—ç¬¦ä¸² è¡¨ç¤ºç”Ÿäº§æ¶ˆæ¯æ”¾åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­
                    Broker.produce(str);
                }else {
                    System.out.println("åŸå§‹æ•°æ®:"+str+"æ²¡æœ‰éµå¾ªåè®®,ä¸æä¾›ç›¸å…³æœåŠ¡");
                }
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        ServerSocket server = new ServerSocket(SERVICE_PORT);
        while (true) {
            BrokerServer brokerServer = new BrokerServer(server.accept());
            new Thread(brokerServer).start();
        }
    }
}

/**

 */
public class MqClient {

    //ç”Ÿäº§æ¶ˆæ¯
    public static void produce(String message) throws Exception {
        //æœ¬åœ°çš„çš„BrokerServer.SERVICE_PORT åˆ›å»ºSOCKET
        Socket socket = new Socket(InetAddress.getLocalHost(), BrokerServer.SERVICE_PORT);
        try (
                PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(socket.getOutputStream())
        ) {
            out.println(message);
            out.flush();
        }
    }

    //æ¶ˆè´¹æ¶ˆæ¯
    public static String consume() throws Exception {
        Socket socket = new Socket(InetAddress.getLocalHost(), BrokerServer.SERVICE_PORT);
        try (
                BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(
                        socket.getInputStream()));
                PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(socket.getOutputStream())
        ) {
            //å…ˆå‘æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—å‘é€å‘½ä»¤
            out.println("CONSUME");
            out.flush();

            //å†ä»æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—è·å–ä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯
            String message = in.readLine();

            return message;
        }
    }

}
